description.para: Create a new seam record and copy the contents of this seam into it.

memberdef.name: clone_seam
memberdef.initializer: if (source) { \ (dest) = newseam (); \ (dest)->location = (source)->location; \ (dest)->widthp = (source)->widthp; \ (dest)->widthn = (source)->widthn; \ (dest)->priority = (source)->priority; \ clone_split ((dest)->split1, (source)->split1); \ clone_split ((dest)->split2, (source)->split2); \ clone_split ((dest)->split3, (source)->split3); \ } \ else { \ (dest) = (SEAM*) NULL; \ } \

detaileddescription.para: Return TRUE if the point positions are the exactly the same. The parameters must be of type (EDGEPT*).

memberdef.argsstring: (SEAMS seam_list, int index, SEAM *seam, TBLOB *left_blob, TBLOB *first_blob)
memberdef.name: insert_seam

memberdef.argsstring: (PRIORITY priority, const TPOINT &location, SPLIT *split1, SPLIT *split2, SPLIT *split3)
memberdef.name: new_seam

memberdef.argsstring: (TBLOB *blobs, SEAMS seams, inT16 start, inT16 end)
memberdef.name: break_pieces

memberdef.argsstring: (TBLOB *piece_blobs, SEAMS seams, inT16 start, inT16 end)
memberdef.name: join_pieces
